about_the_game:
Prepare to enter the Isle of Wicklan, the last bastion of the mortals. This sanctuary, standing as the final defense against the Kingdom of Niav and its infernal adversaries, now faces an encroaching darkness. A vile blight spreads, threatening to consume the land. Wicklan must not succumb.

Revived by the Gods, a once notorious thief and criminal embarks on a journey to save this mist-shrouded realm from eternal damnation. As your ethereal wisp and mortal body reunite you must unveil Wicklan's secrets and thwart the greatest evil—The Damned.


  • Harness Divine Power: Wield the celestial magic bestowed by the Gods alongside the mortal weaponry of swords, spears, and axes.
  • Master Witchcraft: Unleash potent spells to obliterate the encroaching darkness.
  • Gather Resources: Scavenge for equipment, potions, and artifacts essential for your quest to save humanity.

Shape the world to your will. Relentlessly defend this land from the looming threat.


  • Divine Artifacts: To survive and restore Wicklan, utilize the sacred artifacts gifted by the Gods. Your resurrection is their hope to protect what remains and reclaim the lost.

  • Epic Exploration: Traverse caves, scale mountains, and explore dense forests to restore balance. Man’s existence is at stake.

  • Battle Ferocious Enemies: Confront the Windralock in the Forest of Glass, hunt Shades and Rogues, and challenge the Kodlins across the plains. The fate of the universe rests on your shoulders.

content_descriptors.notes: Content focused around slaying fantasy monsters and human characters.

short_description: The Damned have returned. Embark on a journey through the world of Wicklan as the last embers of humanity begin to go out. Battle, steal, and explore your way through a challenging land as you combine different equipment and abilities to fulfill your destiny in this rich open-world RPG.
